attributes.action: To bring back the practise of putting petty criminals in Stocks and Pillories
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a way to stop the mindless villains from making our lives a misery. I propose that the use of Stocks and Pillories be reintroduced; it would dissuade them from behaving in a anti-social way, and give a boost to the flagging sales of rotten fruit. I feel that after a few days out in the weather for the crime, and being laughed at and pelted with rotten fruit, most people would think twice about being a total pain.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/bringbackstocks/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
